seo.title: Vernazza Apartments 2025 | Vacation Rentals in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Find perfect vacation apartments in Vernazza. Self-catering rentals with harbor views, full kitchens, and authentic local living in the village center.

body.title: Vacation Apartments
body.subtitle: Experience Vernazza like a local. Charming apartments in historic buildings with harbor views and all the comforts of home.

features.title: Historic Buildings
features.description: Restored apartments in colorful traditional houses.

features.title: Some with Views
features.description: Select units offer stunning harbor and sea vistas.

features.title: Full Kitchens
features.description: Prepare meals with fresh ingredients from local shops.

features.title: Expect Stairs
features.description: Most units require climbing several flights of steps.

features.title: Ideal for Families
features.description: More space and flexibility than hotel rooms.

features.title: Central Locations
features.description: Within minutes of the piazza, restaurants, and beach.
